answers.answer: Yeah so I keep peanut butter granola bars on me
I ate right before I went pb with crackers thats why im so confused
Happened to me before. I was print in pictures at store and then outta nowhere I had a hot/cold flash and my eyesight went fuzzy then I got nauseous

I literally have been going through the same issues everyday so when I went to my apt I asked the Dr she said maybe it's gestational diabetes took the test and I was normal so I don't know what it could be but my Dr seemed to not care and I still feel sick and dizzy everyday:( wish I had a better answer for u:(
How is your blood pressure? Or iron? Those could also be something to do wi the it too.

Yea. My iron was low when this happened to me. It only happened when I went shopping. Be it the mall or the market. I'd get hot, then winded, fuzzy vision and would have to sit.  That would always be the end of my putting.
This has been happening to me any my doctor told me that i have to drink Gatorade when that happens for the sodium its the hormones
Well right before It happened I took my blood pressure at one of those machines it was 140 69 idk about my iron I do take my prenatals

Im actually at the ob triage right now for symptoms just like yours but I did trow up alot, n still waiting to see what they say, but I bet the doct will ask my to slow down in my work and eat more n drink more wTher...
Let me know what they say

question: Ok Im 33 weeks and I went grocery shopping I was getting light headed dizzy couldnt hear and I sat down then I blacked out my dr says im not eating enough its bs she also says its dehydration I drink a gallon and a half a day .... has this happened to any of you guys
title: so worried
